name: Seedsong (Kate Killick, Chaotic Good Entertainment)
description:
A chill 2D, physics-based sandbox/puzzle game. Complete levels by arranging physics objects for falling seeds to hit, playing notes as they bounce to create a melody. Time it right to match the target sequence and create a satisfying, relaxing sound loop.

HOW TO PLAY

- Click and drag items from the left into the play space and position them

- Click and drag them with the right mouse button to rotate them

- Try to match the musical sequence as shown on the top timeline

- When you clear a level, use the level selector at the bottom left to go to the next level

- You can also use the level selector to skip a level if you get stuck
